sentences.sentence: This is apparently the reliquary referenced by the stele.
sentences.translation: 这个铁箱子显然就是石碑上所提及的圣物箱…

sentences.sentence: The "Reliquary Arm of St George" nicely illustrates the tale.
sentences.translation: “圣乔治手臂的” 圣髑盒栩栩如生的讲述着他的传奇故事。

sentences.sentence: The sides of the reliquary are about an inch long and it is 73 percent gold.
sentences.translation: 这个遗物箱大约一英寸长，含金量为73%。
